TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProjectCachePluginBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Only one plugin instance can exist for a given BuildManager BeginBuild / EndBuild session. Any exceptions thrown by the plugin will cause MSBuild to fail the build.

Docs.summary: Called once before the build, to have the plugin instantiate its state. Errors are checked via .

Docs.summary: Called once after all the build to let the plugin do any post build operations (log metrics, cleanup, etc). Errors are checked via .

Docs.summary: Called once for each build request. Operation needs to be atomic. Any side effects (IO, environment variables, etc) need to be reverted upon cancellation. MSBuild may choose to cancel this method and build the project itself. Errors are checked via .

Docs.summary: Called when a build request finishes execution. This provides an opportunity for the plugin to take action on the aggregated file access reports from . Errors are checked via .
